schemas.description: An example for the following endpoint: /api/examples. methods: [] stands for 'All methods are allowed'. This endpoint also has 2 sub endpoint examples, a subSchemaEndpoint and a subEndpoint.
An example for the following endpoint: /api/examples. methods: [] stands for 'All methods are allowed'. This endpoint also has 2 sub endpoint examples, a subSchemaEndpoint and a subEndpoint.
An example for the following endpoint: /api/relationexamples. This is the most common way of creating an Endpoint for a Schema. But in this specific example we only allow the GET and DELETE calls.
